notes: The 'C1' platform is a goldmine. Volvo 300mm/320mm brakes bolt onto Mazda 3s and Focuses for a massive upgrade. Control arms are often interchangeable but check ball joint sizes (18mm vs 21mm). Rear sway bars interchange between Mazdaspeed3 and Volvo V50 AWD.

The US Buick Regal IS an Opel Insignia. Body panels, suspension, and interior bits often swap. The Saab 9-5 NG uses the long-wheelbase version of this platform. Brembo brakes from the Regal GS/Insignia OPC bolt onto standard Malibus with 19"+ wheels.

The 'World Engine' accessories (alternators, AC compressors) often swap between Chrysler 2.4L and Mitsubishi 4B11/4B12. Suspension arms are highly interchangeable. Lancer Evolution X suspension parts can sometimes be fitted to Outlanders for lowering.

US Fusion and Euro Mondeo are twins. Headlights (with coding), suspension, and interior trim swap. The Lincoln MKZ offers aluminum suspension components that are a direct lightweight upgrade for the Fusion/Mondeo.

The Dodge Dart is basically a widened Alfa Giulietta. Brake components and some suspension architecture are shared. The Jeep Cherokee KL uses a lifted version; 3.2L Pentastar parts are unique, but 2.4L Tigershark engine parts are shared with the Dart.

Buick Encore and Opel Mokka are identical. Chevy Sonic RS brakes (4-lug disc) are a popular upgrade for lower trim Sonics and older Aveos with modification. 1.4L Turbo Ecotec engine parts are universal across this platform.
